name: Finders Keepers (itch)
description:
Have you ever really needed to make some quick cash but had to do something downright terrible to get it? How about breaking into the homes of the residents of Monstervale? No you're not robbing them, but actually bagging yourself some real monsters. There's a high price being paid for their skulls and there's no better opportunity then right here right now. What will you do with the money? Only time will tell. This is your chance to live the life of a terrible kid who lives down the street, are you a rude enough kid?

Let the bodies hit the floor and put your power wheel in overdrive.

Made by:

Allen-Michael Brower - @ambocclusion - Programming

Jeffrey Green - @JeffreyGreenII - Programming

Josh Grilli - @JoshGrilli - Art

Noah Park - Music
